question: Which state government has signed an MoU with ‘AMUL’, to boost self-help groups and milk cooperatives?
explanation:
The state government of Andhra Pradesh has signed an MoU with the milk cooperative major AMUL (Anand Milk Union Limited).
The agreement aims to promote empowerment of women self-help groups and encourage milk cooperatives in government sector. It also provides exposure to world class infrastructure, technology and market access to the local groups.
